Name: cement production, ZN/D, new alternative constituents 36-50%, in conformity with SIA 2049 | waste concrete gravel | EN15804GD, S
Category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster
Description: The cement Susteno is made of processed mixed granulate from demolition projects as a major additive. The cement Susteno reduces the clinker content of the cement and contributes to a closed material cycle.
